title: Zog
overview: Meet the flying doctors:  Zog the dragon, Sir Gadabout and Princess Pearl. This surprising trio work together to care for the weird and wonderful inhabitants of their fantastical world.  Based on the award winning films ‘Zog' and ‘Zog and the Flying Doctors' and the books by Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler, Magic Light Pictures presents an animated comedy adventure series of 52 x 11' episodes for 4-6 year olds about caring for others, yourself and the amazing world around you.
